article.title: Multilateral Development Bank Contract Opportunities - Illinois U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn about multilateral development bank contract opportunities from the Illinois U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

​African Development Bank (AFDB) – Tunis, Tunisia
Briana Rheenshuler, State Econ/Commercial Officer
Telephone: (011) 216 771 07 460
Fax: (011) 216 71 107 090
Email:RheenshulerB@state.gov
Website:http://www.afdb.org

We are pleased to share the African Development Bank recent trade leads. Updates are available in our page:http://tunisia.usembassy.gov/afdb-trade-leads.html.

Asian Development Bank(ADB) – Manila, Philippines
Margaret Keshishian, Director/Senior Commercial Officer
Telephone: (011) 632 516-5093; (011) 632 301-6222
Fax: (011) 632-516-6958
Email:Margaret.Keshishian@trade.gov
Website:http://export.gov/adb/

European Bank forReconstruction & Development(EBRD)– London, United Kingdom
Wil Center, Senior Commercial Officer
Telephone: (011) 44 207 338-7493
Email:will.center@trade.gov
Website:http://export.gov/ebrd/

Inter-American Development Bank(IDB) – Washington, DC
Barbara White, Deputy Director
Telephone: (202) 623-3822
Fax: (202) 623-2039
Email:barbaraw@iadb.org
Website:http://export.gov/idb/

The World Bank – Washington, DC
Scott Bozek, Senior Commercial Officer
Telephone: (202) 458-0120
Email:scott.bozek@trade.govorebozek@worldbank.org
Website:http://export.gov/worldbank/
